channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] File Storage for Classic (file-storage) is the new name of File Storage
[updated] Block Storage for Classic (block-storage-group) is the new name of Block Storage
[updated] Cloud Backup for Classic (cloud-backup) is the new name of Cloud Backup
[updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has changed the description of the plan named architecture-workshop
item.description: *before*: Are you modernizing an existing application or building a new application for IBM Cloud? Get in-depth, expert guidance on deployment of IBM Cloud in your environment., *after*: Are you modernizing an existing application or building a new application for IBM Cloud? Get in-depth, expert guidance on deployment of IBM Cloud in your environment.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named build-svcs-powervs
item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will provision and configure the solution design in IBM Cloud for development, test, production and/or disaster recovery environments.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named build-svcs-vmware
item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will provision and configure the solution design in IBM Cloud for development, test, production and/or disaster recovery environments.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named build-svcs-vpcroks
item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will provision and configure the solution design in IBM Cloud for development, test, production and/or disaster recovery environments.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named cld-native-developer-bootcamp
item.description: The IBM Cloud Native Bootcamp is course setup to introduce developers to cloud native development concepts and tooling. Through this course, students will learn how to develop, test, deploy, and manage cloud native applications.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has changed the description of the plan named design-thinking-workshop
item.description: *before*: Explore the problem and opportunity space to arrive on a solution vision and a crisply defined minimum viable product (MVP) statement. Align stakeholders around the solution hypothesis, MVP and the next steps needed to start building., *after*: Explore the problem and opportunity space to arrive on a solution vision and a crisply defined minimum viable product (MVP) statement. Align stakeholders around the solution hypothesis, MVP and the next steps needed to start building.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has changed the description of the plan named garage-mvp-build
item.description: *before*: Co-create with a team of Garage developers, architects and designers, to build and deploy a user-ready, cloud–native, minimum viable product using the IBM Garage Methodology., *after*: Co-create with a team of IBM Cloud Expert Labs developers, architects and designers, to build and deploy a user-ready, cloud–native, minimum viable product.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named migrate-svcs-vmware
item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will migrate or assist the client with migration tasks related to the IBM Cloud environment.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named migrate-svcs-vpcroks
item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will migrate or assist the client with migration tasks related to the IBM Cloud environment.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named on-demand-consulting--premium-
item.description: Gain remote access to IBM’s Data & AI Experts and Watson Academy education resources, for up to 10 users during all phases of a project life cycle for 3 months. Additionally, get 48 hours of mentoring time to be used for activities during the term of this Cloud Service.

item.title: [updated] Consult with IBM Garage (consult-with-icg-wes) has a new plan named operate-svcs-powervs
item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will define operations and governance models tailored for IBM Cloud, including DevSecOps.

item.description: IBM Cloud Expert Labs will define operations and governance models tailored for IBM Cloud, including DevSecOps.

item.description: A fast, simple, secure way to physically transfer terabytes to petabytes of data to IBM Cloud.
